There is a reason why Portal is among the highest rated games on Steam. This is the game that can appeal to people who are not into any sort of 3D platformers (like myself) or into Puzzle games in general and literally to anyone who likes gaming at least a little bit. A true masterpiece that is only matched by its successor, Portal 2. 

Portal is the easiest game there is to recommend for someone to play. Get the game now and you will not regret it! Get Portal 2 as well and your life will be complete =)
